Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides a support package to people of a homeless background or at risk of becoming homeless. Support includes life and social skills, jobsearch training and full-time or part-time paid employment with Aspire (employment involves packing, mailing and distribution, plus retail shop work dealing with surplus IT equipment and PAT testing) and serves the Sheffield area. Referral by any statutory or recognised community agency. Volunteers also welcome during working hours, please contact for further details. Company limited by guarantee no 4137726.

category.entry: HOUSING, ADVICE AND SUPPORT FOR HOMELESS OR VULNERABLE PEOPLE
